databaseoperation.name: getMarketInformationRecord
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select * from tbl_marketinformation where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid# and marketinformation_id=#marketinformation_id#

databaseoperation.name: getTerritoryId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: SELECT (SELECT TOP 1 wrs.workflow_function FROM workflowrequestsstatus wrs WHERE wrs.workflowrequests_id = wr.workflowrequests_id ORDER BY workflowrequestsstatus_id DESC) AS workflow_function ,(SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM tbl_invitation_status_lku WHERE invitation_status_id=wr.workflowstatus_id) AS aar_statusid_desc FROM workflowrequests wr WHERE objecttype='Onboarding' AND wr.objectid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getAgencyCurrentMarketInfoRecord
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(total_annual_revenue as numeric(18,2))) as total_annual_revenue,dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(commercial_premium as numeric(18,2))) as commercial_premium,cast(percentage_premium_standard as numeric(5,2)) as percentage_premium_standard, cast(percentage_speciality_lines as numeric(5,2)) as percentage_speciality_lines, total_commercial_carriers,surplus_license_holder,is_current_business_written_exist,agency_profitiblity_last_3years,agent_market_monoline_auto_n_worker_comp,agent_market_worker_comp,agent_growth_rate_last_3years,agent_growth_rate_last_3years_yr2,agent_growth_rate_last_3years_yr3,new_business,mix_of_personal_business,mix_of_commercial_business,total_premium_PC,dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(total_written_premium_previous_year_end as numeric(18,0))) as total_written_premium_previous_year_end from tbl_agency_current_market_informations where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getAgencyReviewResponses
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select learn_about,interest_in_other_business,interest_for_appointment,agency_experience,agency_financials,perpetuation_plan,marketing_plan,location_of_agency,other_companies_representated,agency_brief_profile from tbl_agency_review where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getMarketInformationList
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by marketinformation_id) rownum,case when aar_carrierid = -1 then other_company_description else (select description from carrier_lku where carrier_id=aar_carrierid) end as aar_carrierid_desc, (select description from tbl_lob_lku where lob_id=aar_lobid) as lob_desc, case when loss_ratio is null or loss_ratio='' then '' else loss_ratio end as loss_ratio, dbo.getAmountFormat(writtenpremium) as writtenpremium,retentionrate,commissionrate,marketinformation_id,dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(class1volume as numeric(18,2))) as class1volume,dateofappointment,yearofappointment, convert(varchar(20),dateofappointment,101) as dateofappointmentFormatted,aar_carrierid,aar_requestid,years_represented, dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(PY_written_premium as numeric(18,2))) as PY_written_premium, cgl.carrier_group_desc ,dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(total_volume as numeric(18,2))) as total_volume, life_volume, pl_volume, cl_volume, case when is_cl_auto_lsc_carrier is null or is_cl_auto_lsc_carrier=0 then 'N' else 'Y' end as is_cl_auto_lsc_carrier_desc from tbl_marketinformation tm left join carrier_group_lku cgl on cgl.carrier_group_id=tm.carrier_group_id where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getPersonalInformationList
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by personalinformation_id) rownum,personalinformation_id,aar_requestid,name,company,address, case when phone is not null then substring(phone,1,3) + '-' + substring(phone,4,3) + '-' + substring(phone,7,4) else phone end as phone,relationship,last_updated_by,last_updated_ts from tbl_agencypersonalinformation where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getAgencyTerminatedList
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by agencyterminated_id) rownum,agencyterminated_id,aar_requestid,company_name ,dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(annual_premium_volume as numeric(18,2))) as annual_premium_volume ,date_closed,convert(varchar(20),date_closed,101) as dateClosedFormatted,reason_for_action_taken, case when reason_for_action_taken='0' then 'Low Production' else case when reason_for_action_taken='1' then 'High Loss Ratio' else case when reason_for_action_taken='2' then 'Other' end end end as reason_for_action_taken_desc,reason_other from tbl_agencyterminated where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getAgencyMergersList
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by agencymerger_id) rownum,agencymerger_id,aar_requestid,agencymerger_name,date_acquired, convert(varchar(20),date_acquired,101) as dateAcquiredFormatted,dbo.getAmountFormat(volume) as volume from tbl_agencymergers where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getCommentsfromTblAgencyappointmnetRequest
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select comments from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getTerritoryId
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: SELECT (SELECT TOP 1 wrs.workflow_function FROM workflowrequestsstatus wrs WHERE wrs.workflowrequests_id = wr.workflowrequests_id ORDER BY workflowrequestsstatus_id DESC) AS workflow_function ,(SELECT DESCRIPTION FROM tbl_invitation_status_lku WHERE invitation_status_id=wr.workflowstatus_id) AS aar_statusid_desc FROM workflowrequests wr WHERE objecttype='Onboarding' AND wr.objectid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getCorporationPartnershipList
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by corporation_partnership_details_id) rownum,name,title,ind_experience,aar_requestid, corporation_partnership_details_id from tbl_corporation_partnership_details where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getSegmentClassesList1
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by segment_industry_classes_id) rownum,segment_class_name,aar_requestid,segment_industry_classes_id, dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(annual_premium as numeric(18,2))) as annual_premium,Key_contact_name,Key_contact_email from tbl_segment_industry_classes s where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getProgramBusinessList
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by program_business_id) rownum,aar_requestid,program_business_id,dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(premium as numeric(15,0))) as premium,program_name,segment_class_name as segment_class_name1,product_lines,mga_mgu from tbl_program_business where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getSegmentClassesList4
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by segment_industry_classes_id) rownum ,segment_class_name,aar_requestid,segment_industry_classes_id ,dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(annual_premium as numeric(18,2))) as annual_premium,contact ,Key_contact_name,Key_contact_email from tbl_segment_industry_classes s where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getBusinessStateCode
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 s.abbreviation as state_code from tbl_address a left join state_lku s ON s.state_id = a.state_id where type = 1 and aar_requestid = #aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getClAutolscCarrierStatus
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (select 1 from tbl_marketinformation tm left join carrier_group_lku cgl on cgl.carrier_group_id=tm.carrier_group_id where is_cl_auto_lsc_carrier = 1 and aar_requestid = #aar_requestid# and isnull(#marketinformation_id#,0) != marketinformation_id) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END as is_cl_auto_lsc_carrier_selected

databaseoperation.name: editMarketInfoForEdit
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select row_number() over(order by marketinformation_id) as rownum,(select description from carrier_lku where carrier_id=aar_carrierid) as aar_carrierid_desc, (select description from tbl_lob_lku where lob_id=aar_lobid) as lob_desc, case when loss_ratio is null or loss_ratio='' then '' else loss_ratio end as loss_ratio, dbo.getAmountFormat(writtenpremium) as writtenpremium,retentionrate,commissionrate,marketinformation_id,dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(class1volume as numeric(15,0))) as class1volume, dateofappointment, convert(varchar(20),dateofappointment,101) as dateofappointmentFormatted,aar_carrierid,aar_requestid,years_represented, dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(PY_written_premium as numeric(15,0))) as PY_written_premium, dbo.getAmountFormat(cast(total_volume as numeric(15,0))) as total_volume, life_volume, pl_volume, cl_volume, is_cl_auto_lsc_carrier from tbl_marketinformation where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid# and marketinformation_id=#marketinformation_id#

databaseoperation.name: saveMarketInfo
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: insert into tbl_marketinformation(aar_requestid,aar_carrierid,class1volume,last_updated_by,last_updated_ts,loss_ratio,PY_written_premium,years_represented,total_volume,life_volume,pl_volume,cl_volume,is_cl_auto_lsc_carrier) values (#aar_requestid#,#aar_carrierid#,#class1volume#,#last_updated_by#,#last_updated_ts#,#loss_ratio#,#PY_written_premium#,#years_represented#,#total_volume#,#life_volume#,#pl_volume#,#cl_volume#,#is_cl_auto_lsc_carrier#)

databaseoperation.name: insertCommentInTblAgencyAppntReq
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update tbl_agencyappointmentrequest set comments = #comments# where aar_requestid =#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getRequestDataForAgent
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select aar_statusid from tbl_agencyappointmentrequest where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: insertCommentInTblAgencyAppntReq
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update tbl_agencyappointmentrequest set comments = #comments# where aar_requestid =#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getStateAbreviationForDocumentTemplate
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select sl.abbreviation as stateAbbreviation from tbl_address adr left join state_lku sl on sl.state_id = adr.state_id where type = #AgencyAddresType# and person_id is null and adr.aar_requestid=#aar_requestid#

databaseoperation.name: getAccountTypeForDocumentTemplate
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 bank_account_type as accountType from tbl_agencybankinformation where aar_requestid=#aar_requestid# and bank_account_type='T'

databaseoperation.name: getEmailforPerson
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: select top 1 e_mail as email from tbl_address where person_id = #contact# and aar_requestid=#aar_requestid# and type=1

databaseoperation.name: insertCommentInTblAgencyAppntReq
databaseoperation.sqlstmt: update tbl_agencyappointmentrequest set comments = #comments# where aar_requestid =#aar_requestid#
